effects: Physical damage (1x, ATK) to all enemies
Reduce resistance to Lightning by 50% for 2 turns to all enemies
Add Lightning element to physical attacks for 2 turn(s) to caster

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Fatal Barrage (505790)
	Last Shot (505780)
name: Electro Assault

desc_short: Damage and reduce lightning resistance for all enemies, and add lightning element to own physical attack, and enable last shot and fatal barrage for one turn
攻擊全體敵人+降低雷屬性耐性的數值+將自身的物理攻擊賦予雷屬性+1回合內「最後一射」「致命火力」
적 전체에 피해+번개속성 저항력 감소+사용자의 번개공격에 얼음속성 부여+1턴 동안 '라스트 샷', '꽃잎 세례' 사용 가능
Dégâts, réduit la résistance à la foudre de tous les ennemis, ajoute l'élément de foudre à l'attaque physique du lanceur et active Dernier tir et Barrage fatal pendant un tour
Fügt allen Gegnern Schaden zu und reduziert ihre Blitzresistenz + fügt eigenem phys. Angriff Blitzelement hinzu. Ermöglicht eine Runde lang Letzter Schuss und Tödliches Sperrfeuer.
Daña y reduce la res. al rayo de todos los enemigos, añade elemento rayo a los ataques físicos propios y aprende Disparo final y Ráfaga mortal durante un turno
